name: [Loop]
description:
[Loop]

[Loop] is a 3d puzzle platformer where you loop through the same room repeatedly, but the solution becomes more complicated every time you do so.

It was also my first game made with godot and I enjoyed the process a lot.

How to Play:

Controls are rather simple, you move with the classic WASD, and are able to pick up objects with "e".

Right now, there are only four levels, due to the limited time during the gamejam.

Hint for level 4: use the box, there's a feature that's most certainly not a bug.

Notes:

I'm new to godot and despite my best efforts, there still is an issue with the physics where the cube may vanish at ludicrous speed. For now you'll have to restart if that happens.
